name: Parrot
description:
Turn OpenVoiceOS into a parrot. Speak a phrase and listen to it repeated in OVOS's voice.

"Hey Mycroft, start parrot"
"hello"
hello
"what"
what
"who are you"
who are you
"Stop parrot"
examples: Repeat Once upon a midnight dreary, while I pondered, weak and weary, Over.
Speak I can say anything you'd like!
Tell me what I just said.
author: OpenVoiceOS
